programme.title: Merry Ex-Mas
programme.desc: A man becomes snowbound with his ex-wife, her suitor, his former mother-in-law and his daughter.

programme.title: Our Dream Christmas
programme.desc: A Mississippi woman brings her family to Los Angeles to spend Christmas with her dying mother.

programme.title: Alone for Christmas
programme.desc: When burglars try to take the presents from under the Christmas tree, the family dog must stop them.

programme.title: Santa Baby
programme.desc: A woman (Jenny McCarthy) helps her father (George Wendt), Santa Claus, prepare for Christmas.

programme.title: A Holiday Homecoming
programme.desc: The residents of Hope, NY come to the aid of displaced foster children.

programme.title: A Heartland Christmas
programme.desc: Amy, Ty, Jack y Tim se arriesgan a perderse la Navidad para salvar caballos hambrientos.

programme.title: Christmas with a Prince
programme.desc: A busy doctor reluctantly agrees to allow an injured prince to convalesce in her pediatric ward.

programme.title: Small Town Santa
programme.desc: When a sheriff arrests a home intruder claiming to be Santa Claus, his world is turned upside-down!

programme.title: Christmas Lights
programme.desc: A rivalry turns into all-out war as friends try to out-do each other with holiday decorations.

programme.title: Hometown Holiday
programme.desc: Opposites attract when hometown girl Kristen meets L.A. lawyer Ryan Roarke.

programme.title: A Christmas Karen
programme.desc: After displaying her privilege, entitled middle-aged woman Karen receives an intervention by some spirits.

programme.title: Christmas Recipe for Romance
programme.desc: Abby enters a cooking contest to help save her family-run hotel.

programme.title: Operation Christmas List
programme.desc: Barney and his friends plan to beat the Christmas rush and buy the entire stock of a popular toy.

programme.title: The Snowball Effect
programme.desc: Rival meteorologists Tara and Sam find themselves stuck in a village that Christmas forgot.
